original_text: Then the third brother married the woman. The same thing happened to all seven brothers. They all died but they had no children.
korean_text: 일곱이 다 그와 같이 자식이 없이 죽고

sentences.original_text: Then the third brother married the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 세 번째 형제가 그 여자와 결혼했습니다

sentences.original_text: The same thing happened to all seven brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 같은 일이 일곱 형제 모두에게 일어났습니다
